name: Cab Driver Commander
description:
Cool crime storyline tasks, dynamic music and gameplay, leveling, level, realistic behavior, a large map with lots of buildings.
Tasks (special) are absolutely random. There are such that you need to perform the same thing, but the price is specifically different. Completely unique plot tasks will fill the game with meaning.
Pumping divided into 2 types (for the character and for cars). All this is in different tabs.
In the leveling for the character available 3 improvements. Endurance. Charisma. Luck.
With endurance, everything is clear. Charisma and luck gives a faster passing game. More money for the job. Chance x2 reward for the task. Less cost of rest at the hotel.
Rewards for tasks directly depend on:
- character level
- Job Type
- level of charisma
- Level of difficulty
- The level of luck.
- Random factor.
The main thing is not to delay. And quickly perform tasks. For each accomplishment you are given 20 experience points. For the specials. task 10 points.
The number of points needed to switch to the new LEVEL = 10 * (Level) 2
•
Also when performing a task, carefully read the conditions that need to be fulfilled! To avoid cases that you do not know what to do and can not perform QUEST.
For simplicity and interest in the game added markers. They show where to go to complete the QUEST. Indicate the direction of movement. The shortest way. If you are a professional and not one hour played in this game. You and without a marker will know where and what house is located.

Machines (bots) go on a given path. Sometimes there are accidents. The machine specifically stalls on the sidewalk, so as not to interfere (visually) with others.

Features:
-achievements;
- nice graphics;
-simple management;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;
- availability in 2 languages.
